validation general [ovn] should have a o: Checks the presence of the ovn-k8s namespace, to make sure that the ovn-k8s is used as sdn.
validation general should have one machi: Checks the existance of a machine config pool with the value passed in the ROLE_WORKER_CNF env variable (or the default worker-cnf).
validation general should report all mac: Checks that all the machine config pools are ready so the tests can be run.
validation performance Should have the p: Checks the existence of the PerformanceProfile CRD used by the Performance Addon Operator.
validation performance should have the p: Check if the Performance Addon Operator is running.
Checks the existence of the Performance Addon Operator's namespace.
validation ptp should have the linuxptp: Check if the linuxptp daemonset is running.
validation ptp should have the ptp CRDs: Checks the existence of the ptp CRDs used by the PTP Operator.
validation ptp should have the ptp names: Checks the existence of the PTP Operator's namespace.
validation ptp should have the ptp opera: Check if the PTP Operator is running.
validation sctp should have a sctp enabl: Check the presence of a machine config that enables sctp.
validation sctp should have the sctp ena: Check if the sctp machine config is used by the declared machine config pool.
validation sriov Should have the sriov C: Checks the existence of the SR-IOV CRDs used by the SR-IOV Operator.
validation sriov should deploy the injec: Check the optional presence of the SR-IOV injector pod
validation sriov should deploy the opera: Check the optional presence of the SR-IOV webhook
validation sriov should have the sriov n: Checks the existence of the SR-IOV Operator's namespace.
validation sriov should have the sriov o: Check if the SR-IOV Operator is running.
